body.name: FOTOSOK 6-Tier Open Bookcase and Bookshelf, Freestanding Display Storage Shelves Tall Bookshelf Bookcase for Bedroom, Living Room and Office, Light Oak
features: ☸ Never Outdated ☸ The design of this gray bookcase is simple, stylish and exquisite. It can be placed in the living room to display your unique collections and enhance the style. Of course, you can also place multiple bookcases together to create a small library and enjoy the tranquility.

☸ Stable & Safe ☸ There is a stability device behind the large bookcases, you can fix it during installation to ensure the comfort of your family and pets, while avoiding accidental collapse of it and damage to the floor. We will provide customers with stable and safe bookshelves.

☸ 6 Shelves Capacity ☸ 6-tier open bookshelf can meet your storage needs, you can put your books, photos, collectibles and souvenirs on the industrial shelves, the maximum bearing capacity of each layer is 22 pounds.
☸ Premium Materials ☸ Mainly composed of particleboard material, you don't have to worry about it being damaged in a short time. (Approximate size of each tier: 23.6*9.3*11.2 inch)

☸ Installation and Service ☸ Every detail and part is reflected in the manual, installation is no longer a problem. If you encounter problems during the purchase and use of our narrow bookcase, please do not hesitate to send message to us through Amazon.
body.description: ☸ MULTIPLE COLORS: This book case has a variety of colors, and each color exudes a unique charm. ☸ EASY TO CLEAN: Even if the dark bookshelf is full of crud, it is not easy to see. When you are free, you just need to wipe the damp cloth gently to clean it up. ☸ MULTIPLE ROLES: ◆ Office Shelf: Put all kinds of documents and sundries in the office ◆ Bookshelves: Build a small library at home ◆ Storage Shelf: Show your favorite collectibles in the living room ☸ PRODUCT DATA: Color: Light Oak Material: Particle Board Product Size: 23.6 x 9.25 x 70.8 inches Bearing Weight Per Layer: 17-22 pounds ☸ NOTE: 1.Please check the size of the vertical bookshelf before purchasing, whether it meets your expectations and actual needs. 2.The wood bookshelf cannot be placed in a damp place for a long time, which may reduce its service life. 3.Do not place too much overweight items, otherwise the bookcase will be easily damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: very easy to build and also very protected, came very safe in very nice packing inside, is tall as I need and very nice love’t I did buy mire if them because these are very good for what I need to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Honestly these are the absolute best bookshelves. I had originally bought 3 of them from wayfair and they got discontinued through there. I was on the hunt for more to expand my continually growing book collection and found these. They are an EXACT MATCH! I was so excited because these are SO beautiful and the best shelves I've ever owned. The directions are straight forward and easy to understand and the shelf is very sturdy. The color and quality for the price is unbeatable. By far my favorite shelves.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Bookshelf that I needed for my Media!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this bookcase/bookshelf to use it as my media storage. The bookcase fit perfect in the space. It looks good, feels sturdy enough, and it was easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks good and sturdy, textbooks don't fit
reviews.reviewText: The positives are that this bookshelf is a great value for the money. It looks good and took less than an hour to assemble. It is very sturdy. Know that it does not come with a screwdriver to assemble it so you will have to provide that yourself. I used an electric drill driver and assembly went smooth and quick.The cons are that it does look cheap in places. The stickers to cover the nail holes are apparent if you look closely. Also the 2 long sides are in 2 parts which can make it less sturdy. My biggest complaint about the bookshelf is that textbooks don't fit on the shelfs and the shelfs can be repositioned to different heights as they are nailed at pre-determined intervals. This makes the bookshelf studier but doesn't allow you to account for different sized books.All in all I think it is a good buy and will be buying a few more now that I seen it is sturdy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Purchased for gift.
reviews.reviewText: Within the past year, this made my 4th purchase of this item. I have 3 in my home to store books and my essential oils. My granddaughter wanted a bookshelf for Christmas and she wanted 1 just like mine. The bookshelf is easy to put together and sturdy. The color is beautiful. I purchased the gray color. Will purchased again when I buy more books. Great item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price!
reviews.reviewText: This was extremely easy to put together. I did use a power drill but you could absolutely use a regular screw driver. The directions were pretty vague so there was one part I had to take apart and redo, but other than that no issues. I saw some reviews where there are missing holes but I didn’t have that problem at all. For the price of this piece you really can’t beat it! I will definitely be adding a second one soon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific bookcase for the money!
reviews.reviewText: You only need a phillip-head screwdriver to assemble, although I also used pliers to screw in the connector bolts to join the two halves of the bookcase. I took my time, so assembly took me around four hours. First to lay out and organize the various parts, then to figure out the instructions. It's very helpful that the bookcase board parts have the numbers on them as they are similar in appearance. Not much written instructions, mainly drawings showing how to assemble. My experience working with particle board is that you have to make sure not to overtighten the screws or you will strip the threads. So I hand-tightened everything, I didn't use an automatic screwdriver. I purchased a white unit, so it came with white stickers to cover the screw holes. Surprisingly effective, they are difficult to see and make the sides of the bookcase appear seamless. The bookcase is solid when the two halves are joined, the shelves have no problem carrying the weight to the books placed upon it. I'm pleased with the unit and would recommend it to others that need a bookcase of this size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to Put Together
reviews.reviewText: Sturdy shelving. Easy to put together. Holds alot. Looks great.
